sentences.english: Pooling in the pelvic cavity. Which means her heart was stillpumping.
sentences.chinese: 骨盆腔有血液淤积，说明当时她的心脏还在跳动。

sentences.english: The perichondrium carries the blood supply to the cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 软骨膜是向软骨输送血液的。

sentences.english: Describes the constitution, principle and the latest of Homodialysis Machine.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了血液透析机的组成原理及最新进展。

sentences.english: An iodine-based contrast is injected into the bloodstream and watched as it travels around.
sentences.chinese: 注射到血液中碘的对比，看着它旅行左右。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the study on haemogram and blood biochemical parameters of 12 healthy Sichuan golden monkeys (Rhinopithecus roxellanae).
sentences.chinese: 测定了12只川金丝猴的血象和血液生物化学指标。

sentences.english: The poison is in her blood and on her breath.
sentences.chinese: 现在她的血液和呼吸中毒有剧毒。

sentences.english: Researchers say the water dilutes the blood, making it less likely to clot.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员说，水可以稀释血液，使之不易发生凝结。

sentences.english: This oxygen-rich blood will then be pumped out through the octopus' body.
sentences.chinese: 充满氧气的血液将会通过章鱼的身体被输送到体外。

sentences.english: And there's something on that grass that cures that blood disease.
sentences.chinese: 草叶子上面的什么东西就把她的血液病给治好了。

sentences.english: How long must the iron-hearted monster feed on our life's blood?
sentences.chinese: 这铁石心肠的怪物吸着我们的血液，还得吸多久呢？

sentences.english: Into the camp, blood tests found Lee's living with HIV in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 进劳教所时，抽血化验查出李的血液中携带艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: We unfortunately don't have a blood test or an X-ray to confirm it.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸，我们没有血液测试或X光测试来证实这种病。

sentences.english: We had some more new blood on our team.
sentences.chinese: 新鲜血液输入了我们的队伍中。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the effect of Jipailin on blood rheology in acute stage in cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨吉派林对脑梗死急性期血液流变学的影响。

sentences.english: I must eat things with Iron as well, because of the increasing of blood.
sentences.chinese: 吃含铁多的物质，因为血液的增加会需要大量的铁。

sentences.english: These composition can achieve the whole body circularly through blood each place.
sentences.chinese: 这些成分可以通过血液循环达到全身各部位。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
